00040 class Classifier2D {
00041 public:
00042         parameter       *theparam;
00043         lenet7                  *thenet;

00045         int                                     width;

00049         double                  brightness;
00050         double                  coeff;

00055         Idx<void*>  results;            
00056         Idx<double> smoothing_kernel;

00060                 double b, double c, int h, int w);
00061   virtual ~Classifier2D();
00062 
00063   Idx<double> fprop(ubyte *img, float zoom, double threshold = 1.8, int objsize = 60);
00064   
00065   // Sub functions
00066   Idx<ubyte> multi_res_prep(ubyte *img, float zoom);

00068         Idx<double> postprocess_output(double threshold, int objsize);
00072         void mark_maxima(Idx<double> &in, Idx<double> &inc, 
00073                         Idx<double> &r, double threshold);
00074         Idx<double> prune(Idx<double> &res);
00075 };
